resources.string:
1. Double check all of your recovery phrase word by word, are all words correct?
2. The order of words is important! Make sure you've typed the words in the correct order.

If neither of these tips have helped you, or if you don't have a 12, 24 or 27 words recovery phrase please check our help center.

A 2of3 account requires two out of three signatures to spend coins. The third signature is from a backup key known only to you. This gives you the security benefits of a standard account, while still allowing you to move your coins independently at any point in time.
A newer version of Blockstream Green is now available
A screen lock must be enabled from Android settings
Add a note (only you can see it).
Add a PGP public key to receive encrypted email and keep your privacy
QR 코드로 사용자 지정 네트워크 추가
Address was filled by a Payment URI
Advanced options for your third recovery key
All of the accounts in your wallet need to be empty before deleting it.
All the coins received or created as change.
잔액을 확인, 또는 돈을 받거나 종이 지갑을 sweep 할 수 있습니다. 감시모드에서는 송금은 할 수 없습니다.
AMP accounts are only available on Liquid wallets. You may be required to provide your account ID to issuers to receive an AMP Asset.
Another 2FA method is already active. Confirm via 2FA that you authorize this change.
As easy as snapping a photo with your phone. If you have an existing wallet, scan your recovery phrase from settings.
Asset icons are missing, try reloading them.
Assets cannot be used on Bitcoin
Authenticate to view the recovery phrase
Backup the recovery mnemonic and recovery xpub to recover funds from your 2of3 account.
Backup your mnemonic before removing the wallet from this device.
클립보드로 복사하면 다른 앱들이 읽거나 바꿀 수 있음으로 주의하세요
Be sure your recovery phrase is backed up before removing this wallet.
BIP49 accounts allow you to segregate funds, and to receive on wrapped segwit addresses, thus ensuring the highest backwards compatibility when receiving funds from anyone on the network.

BIP84 accounts allow you to segregate your funds, and to receive on bech32 native segwit addresses. This account type ensures cheaper transactions when sending funds, but not all services support bech32 addresses yet.
Bitcoin is the world\'s leading P2P cryptocurrency network. Select to send and receive bitcoin.
Blockstream does not have access to your wallet backup and will not be able to help you in case you lose it
Blockstream Green needs access to Bluetooth in order to connect to hardware wallets. Location data is not used or kept by Blockstream.
Blockstream Green supports both Bitcoin and the Liquid Network. Don\'t worry, you can create another wallet for a different network at any time.
BTChip이 설치되지 않았습니다. 데스크톱 프로그램을 사용하여 설치하시기 바랍니다.
By proceeding to the next steps you agree to the %s
Cancel a reset to unlock your wallet if you recovered access to an old Two-Factor Authentication method.
활성화 된 네트워크는 제거할 수 없으므로 먼저 비활성화 하세요.
Changing reference exchange rate will reset your 2FA threshold to 0. Remember to adjust the 2FA threshold after spending.
Choose a name for your new Blockstream Green wallet.
Choose a name for your wallet
Choose the Electrum servers you trust
Choose this version to connect to your Blockstream Jade with both a usb cable and wireless
Choose this version to disable all radio connections on your Blockstream Jade. This will make your Blockstream Jade incompatible with iOS devices
Click to receive an email with your encrypted recovery data.
Coins for which 2FA protection is expired.
Coins protected by the legacy script recoverable with your nlocktimes.zip file.
Coins protected by the new script with embedded 2FA expiry through CheckSequenceVerify.
Coins received or created before SegWit was activated.
Coins whose asset and amount are publicly visible.

Coins with a value lower than 1092 satoshis that are uneconomic to spend; these coins can be generated by your wallet as change or sent to you by third parties trying to spam or deanonymize your wallet.
Communication timed out. Make sure the device is powered on and try again.
Confirm by typing the wallet name
Confirm transaction details on your harware wallet
Confirm via 2FA that you authorize this change.
Connect Jade with a USB cable to download the latest firmware update
Connect your Jade to use it with Green
Connect your Ledger to use it in Green
Tor를 통해 신뢰하는 노드에 연결하려면 로그인 전, 설정에서 프록시를 활성화 하여야 하고 Socks5 프록시(안드로이드용 Orbot 앱)도 있어야 합니다.
Tor (.onion)에 연결하면 최고의 보안과 프라이버시를 가능케 합니다. 계속하시려면 "확인"을 눌러주세요.
Connection to device failed! Move closer to the device and try again.
Create a wallet for Bitcoin, Liquid or Testnet
사용자 지정 네트워크 추가됨. 네트워크 설정에서 활성화하세요.
이 이름을 가진 사용자 지정 네트워크는 이미 존재합니다
Delete permanently your wallet from the Blockstream Green database. You will never be able to log in to it thereafter.
비밀번호를 삭제할 경우 니모닉(복원 코드)이 없으면 영원히 지갑을 사용하실 수 없게 됩니다. 진행하시려면 "확인"을 누르세요.
Disable PIN access for this wallet on all devices
Distributed under the %s, see LICENSE for more information or visit %s
Don\'t store your recovery phrase on your phone, computer, or any online services.
Don\'t take screenshots of your recovery phrase!
Double check SPV with other servers
사용자 지정 네트워크 디버그 옵션들 활성화하기
Enable email notifications to change nlocktime
Enable or change your PIN to quickly access your wallet
SPV 활성화 및 SPV 설정 변경
Enable testnet in app settings to use Jade
Enable Two-Factor Authentication to protect your wallet from unauthorized transactions or changes to critical security settings
더 나은 보안을 위하여 PGP public 키를 입력한뒤 암호화된 이메일을 받아보세요.
지갑에 sweep 하기 위해서 비밀키를 입력하여 주세요.
유효한 .onion 또는 IP 주소 입력 (.onion 추천)
Enter the email for which you want to delete a dispute request
Enter your 12, 24 or 27 words recovery phrase
Enter your 24 or 27 words recovery phrase
Enter your xPub to add a watch-only wallet where you can receive funds and check your balance without importing your private keys.
하드웨어 지갑으로 로그인 시 오류 발생
Fee rate is above maximum accepted fee rate.
Follow the instructions on your device.
Funds received in this transaction are not confidential.
Generate a new recovery phrase as your third recovery key.
Go to Receive to get your Account ID.
Got it written down? Great. You can enter it here. Don’t lose it, it’ll stay the same.
Green 은 각 네트워크 별로 한 개의 PIN을 지원합니다. 새로운 지갑은 로그인 시 니모닉(복원 코드)이 필요합니다.
Green은 네트워크당 하나의 비밀번호만 지원합니다. 이 지갑에 비밀번호를 설정하시려면 원래 지갑의 비밀번호를 설정에서 비활성화 하세요.
Green 은 지갑에 쉽게 접근하기 위하여 생체인증 기술을 사용합니다.
Green uses Bluetooth for communication with hardware wallets
Green uses Bluetooth to connect to hardware wallets
Green 은 Blockstream 서버의 서명과 사용자의 매체에서 생성되는 서명으로 멀티서명 기술을 사용합니다. 2FA를 설정할 경우, 서버측 서명을 더욱 안전하게 만듭니다.
기밀 자산의 하드웨어 지갑 지원이 곧 출시 될 예정입니다.
I confirm I want to delete this wallet
I confirm I want to disable PIN access on all my devices.
니모닉(복원 코드)을 안전하게 보관하였고 이용약관을 읽었습니다.
I typed all my recovery phrase why can\'t I continue?
I understand amounts could be incorrect
If you are the rightful owner of this wallet, and you still possess one of its active 2FA methods, cancel the reset to be able to spend and empty this wallet.

If you did not request the reset, but you cannot cancel the reset process because you can\'t access any existing Two-Factor Authorization methods, dispute this 2FA reset. This will permanently block your wallet, but you can undo this action.
If you have access to a Two-Factor method for this wallet, cancel the reset to be able to spend and receive immediately, or wait %d days.

If you have some coins on the legacy address type, and you won\'t spend them shortly, you might need to setup an email and receive your recovery transactions to be sure you are always in control of your funds.
If you initiated the 2FA reset dispute by mistake, you can undo it and set the wallet back to 2FA reset state.
Import a Multisig Shield wallet created on Blockstream Green.
Import a wallet created on Blockstream Green.
Import a wallet created with other apps. This option only works with singlesig wallets using BIP39 mnemonics, and following the BIP44, BIP49, or BIP84 derivations.
Inconsistent data provided for enabling Authenticator 2FA
Insert your email to receive 2FA codes to authorize transfers and other operations.
L-BTC가 부족하여 거래를 전송할 수 없습니다. Liquid에서는 L-BTC를 사용하여 거래 수수료를 지불합니다. L-BTC를 받을 주소를 생성해 보세요.
Invalid mnemonic. Continue typing or ask for help
유효하지 않은 니모닉(복원 코드) (24개 또는 27 단어여야 합니다)
Invalid payment request, AssetID has to be specified
잘못된 비밀번호이고 더 시도할 수 없습니다. 니모닉(복원 코드)을 사용하여 로그인하세요.
Invalid status. Check that your device is unlocked and try again.
자산을 맡겨 신뢰를 요구하지 않는 지갑입니다.
It looks like you have no wallets. Click below to add one.
Just a few more steps to get you set up.
Last attempt: if failed, you will have to restore your wallet with your recovery phrase.
L-BTC has no issuer and is instead created on the network via a peg-in.
Ledger 대시 보드가 감지되었습니다. 올바른 앱을 열어 사용하세요.
Ledger supports a limited set of assets: tap here to check the list.
Liquid is a sidechain-based settlement network for traders and exchanges, enabling faster, more confidential Bitcoin transactions and the issuance of digital assets.
Location services are disabled, do you want to enable them?
Locked coins will not be spent nor included in your balance.

Locking coins can help protect your privacy and save on transaction fees. Locked coins are deducted from your balance and are not used when sending transactions. You can only lock coins labeled as dust and unlock them later at any time.
Log in to your Multisig Shield watch-only wallet with a username and password. You can create your watch-only credentials after logging into your Multisig Shield wallet.
보기전용으로 로그인하여 자산을 수령하고 잔액을 조회하세요.
Looks like you haven\'t used a wallet yet. Try creating a new one.
Make sure you have enabled OTG option in Android Settings
Make sure you made a proper backup of your wallet mnemonic.
Managed assets accounts are only available on Liquid wallets. You may be required to provide your account ID to issuers to receive a Managed Asset.
Migrating to Blockstream Green? Have an existing Blockstream Green wallet you’d like to import? Let\'s go!
새 계정 추가 기능이 곧 추가될 예정입니다.
비밀번호 입력하지 않음. 앱을 종료하는 중...
이 자산에 등록된 종목 코드가 없습니다.
접속되지 않았습니다. 접속 시도 중 %d 초...
Once selected, this spending policy cannot be changed. For tips on what type of security is best for you, visit our Help Center.
하나의 네트워크만 선택해야 합니다. 기존값대로 비트코인을 선택합니다.
Onion addresses require Tor connectivity. Enable it in the network settings.
Optimal if you rarely spend coins. Wallet coins will require two-factor reactivation every 455 days to remain protected by two-factor authentication
Optimal if you spend coins every 6 months. Wallet coins will require two-factor reactivation every 6 months to remain protected by two-factor authentication.
오래된 하드웨어 지갑 펌웨어를 감지하였습니다. 데스크톱에서 최신 버전으로 업그레이드하세요.
Please activate at least one fingerprint in Android settings in order to use biometric login
Please contribute if you find Blockstream Green useful
비밀번호를 지우기 전에 생체인증을 먼저 비활성화하세요.
Ledger Nano X를 휴대폰에서 분리하신 다음, 양쪽 버튼은 둘 다 길게 눌러 종료하세요. 종료 후 다시 연결한 다음 비밀번호를 입력하세요.
자산에 대한 접근권한을 잃지 않도록 다른 방법도 활성화하세요.
카메라를 사용하기 위해 카메라에 대한 접근 권한을 활성화하세요.
Please hold on while your address is being generated
다시 시도하기 전에 하드웨어 지갑을 다시 연결하세요.
니모닉(복원 코드)을 안전하게 보관하시고 이용약관에 동의해주세요
Tor를 사용하기 위해서 SOCKS5 프록시와 포트를 활성화/설정해 주세요
Please verify that the address shown on your hardware wallet matches the one on your phone.
Please wait until your Ledger displays the address to validate it. This could take up to 20 seconds.
Provide this ID to the asset issuer if requested.
Provide your AMP ID to the asset issuer if requested.
Receive email notifications for sent and received transactions
Redeem your deposited funds without Blockstream Green signature after a pre-defined period of time.
2FA 재설정에는 최소 12개월이 걸립니다. 2FA 인증방법을 잃어버린 것이 확실한 경우, 재설정을 하기 위해 새로운 이메일 주소를 보내주세요.
Restore a Blockstream Green wallet using your 24 words mnemonic backup. You can find it in the settings of any Blockstream Green app.

Restore a Singlesig wallet created on Blockstream Green, or import a wallet created with other apps. This option only works with singlesig wallets using BIP39 mnemonics, and following the BIP44, BIP49, or BIP84 derivations.
Save a summary of your accounts to speed up recovery in case you need to use our recovery tool.
Scan the QR Code with an Authenticator app
Select a fiat currency and bitcoin denomination to show amounts in your wallet
Select duration of Two-Factor Authentication protection for your coins. The new option applies to newly received coins.
Select the %s app on your Ledger and retry.
모든 자산 보내기는 한명의 수령인만 있어야 합니다
Send and receive Liquid-based Managed Assets
Set a limit to spend without two-factor authentication
Set a timeout to logout after prolonged inactivity
Set an email address to receive transaction notifications
Set up a passcode for your iOS device to set a PIN for Blockstream Green
Set up a screen lock for your Android device to unlock your wallet using Android screen lock
Set up an email to get pre-signed transactions for recovery. Email notifications contain your encrypted recovery data.
Set up credentials to access in watch-only mode to receive coins without putting your private keys at risk. Access from any device using a Blockstream Green app
Show coins with expiring Two-Factor authentication protection.

Signature validation failed. If this error is unexpected and has happened repeatedly, it is possible the hardware wallet is faulty or has been compromised. It could be leaking your keys, which could lead to loss of funds. Please consider replacing the hardware wallet.
Simplified Payment Verification 은 Green 서버 대신 비트코인 네트워크를 활용하여 거래 및 잔액을 검증합니다. SPV 모드를 활성화 하면 더 많은 대역폭 및 프로세싱 파워가 요구됩니다.
Singlesig wallets are not yet supported for use with hardware devices. By continuing you\'ll access a Multisig Shield wallet.
%s.\n\nReset this setting and then re-activate it.
Spend your bitcoin without 2FA up to a certain threshold. After spending bitcoin up to this amount, you will need to reset your threshold to continue spending without 2FA.
SPV는 데이터를 사용하지 않고 항상 Wifi나 Ethernet을 사용하여 동기화됩니다. 이 설정을 키면 모바일 데이터를 사용할 때도 동기화됩니다. 이는 요금제에 따라 매우 비쌀 수 있어 활성화 하실 때 유의해 주세요.
SPV mode is currently available for singlesig bitcoin wallets only.
SPV synchronization using Tor requires a trusted node onion URL
Standard accounts allow you to separate your funds. Each account will have its own receiving addresses, and moving funds across accounts requires a transaction.
Start a 2FA reset process if you lost access to all your two-factor authentication methods.
Start receiving funds and set an email to receive recovery data for your wallet

%s.You need to:
1. Reset Green's Face/TouchID login,
2. Log in with PIN,
3. Re-activate Face/TouchID from Green Settings.
터치하여 Simplified Payment Verification을 다시 시작하세요
터치해서 QR코드를 스캔해보세요. 노드에 연결시켜 SPV노드를 실행할 수 있습니다
Green을 다운로드 해주셔서 감사합니다! 시간 되시면 리뷰를 남겨주세요.
The 1 year 2FA reset process was ongoing, but someone blocked it by disputing the 2FA reset.
The asset registry is currently unavailable: proceed carefully since asset amounts might be shown with a decimal precision different from what intended by the issuers.
카메라에 문제가 있습니다. 기기를 다시 시작하셔야 될 것 같습니다.
The default value is 90 days. If you set an email, you will receive an updated copy of your recovery data.
더 쉽고, 더 안전하고, 더 빠른 지갑
The email will also be used to receive recovery data and transaction notifications
지금 사용하시는 하드웨어 지갑은 아직 지원되지 않습니다.
The Liquid Network is a Bitcoin sidechain. Select to send and receive Liquid Bitcoin (L-BTC), Tether (USDt), and other Liquid assets.
Green 앱에서 선택한 네트워크는 하드웨어 지갑에서 선택한 네트워크랑 일치하지 않습니다. 두 기기에서 동일한 네트워크를 선택해 주세요.
The new email will be used for Two-Factor Authentication when the reset is complete. The reset takes 12 months plus any remaining timelock.
밑의 복원 키는 다시 표시되지 않습니다. 자산을 잃어버리지 않도록 안전하게 보관해두세요.
The recovery phrase can be used to claim your funds at any point. Keep it safe, keep it private.
The recovery phrase doesn\'t match the previously existing wallet. Please retry with a different recovery phrase.
The source code is available at %s
The waiting period is necessary to ensure the security of your wallet, to prevent thieves from getting around your Two-Factor protection.
There are no results for the applied filter
%s 지갑에는 비밀번호가 이미 설정되어 있습니다. 이대로 진행할 경우 비밀번호는 설정할 수 없으며 로그인을 위해서는 24개의 니모닉(복원 코드)이 필요합니다. 3번 로그인 실패를 하거나 설정에서 비밀번호를 해제하실 수 있습니다.
These settings apply for every wallet you use on Blockstream Green.
This feature is coming soon, stay tuned!
This wallet operates on a test network. Anything you receive or send here has no value
This will disable PIN login for this wallet on all your devices. You will need your recovery phrase to access your wallet.
This will log you out and delete this wallet from the app and the Blockstream servers database.
Tip: We recommend you enable more than one 2FA method. If you only set up one 2FA method and then lose it, you\'ll have to wait at least one year until the 2FA expires.

To keep you in control of your funds, Two-Factor Authentication protection expires after roughly %d days since your last payment. You will be prompted to make a Two-Factor Reactivation transaction, if you don\'t move funds often enough.
Tor is not yet available for singlesig wallets
Tor는 %1$s를(을) 사용하고 있고 프록시가 Orbot이거나 Tor이 활성화되어있어야 작동합니다.
Turn on bluetooth to connect your hardware wallet.
Two-Factor protection does not expire on this account, enable 2 separate Two-Factor methods as backup in case you lose access to one.
Green 서비스 연락 실패. 네트워크 연결을 다시 확인하시고 재연결 될 때까지 기다리세요.
알 수 없는 bip21 매개 변수
Unlocked coins can be spent and are included in your balance.
Use a hardware wallet as your third recovery key.
Use an existing recovery phrase as your third recovery key.
Use an xpub for which you own the corresponding private key as your third recovery key.
Use Android screen lock to log in
Use your email to receive recovery transactions and transactions notifications
잘못된 비밀번호 또는 사용자 찾지 못함
Verify your bitcoin transactions are included on the blockchain
Visit %s for further information about the software
Wallet coins will require two-factor reactivation once a year to remain protected by two-factor authentication.
경고: 2FA 재설정 요청이 이미 되어 있습니다. 만약 새로운 이메일 주소로 요청하시면 지갑은 분쟁 상태로 전환되며 영원히 이용하실 수 없게 될 가능성이 높습니다.
경고: 지갑은 2FA 분쟁으로 잠금 상태입니다. 자세한 내용은 고객센터에 문의해주시길 바랍니다.
Warning: Watch-only credentials will be saved on your device
경고! L-BTC 잔액이 남아있어야 거래를 보낼 수 있습니다.
조회전용모드는 비밀번호, 니모닉(복원 코드) 또는 하드웨어 지갑을 통해 로그인한 후 활성화시킬 수 있습니다.
Watch-only mode cannot be activated on Liquid as your funds are fully confidential.
Green은 카메라를 사용하여 QR 코드를 스캔합니다.
Well done, you can continue with your password
We\'ll get you set up in no time. Make sure you have a pen and paper ready!
We\'ll get you set up with an AMP wallet in no time. Note that you can alternatively create AMP accounts in any existing Liquid wallet.
What type of account would you like to add?
Where would you like to transfer the funds?
Write down your recovery phrase on paper and store it somewhere safe.
단어가 일치하지 않습니다. 니모닉(복원 코드)을 확인하시고 다시 시도하시길 바랍니다.

You can change these later on.
